trans: adj. 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

sentences.chinese: “我们还在沼泽建起小桥，”马西埃说，“你需要将一些原木支在下面，去掉上面的树皮，因为它们腐烂的很快。

sentences.chinese: 事情过去二十年了，他的死仍然是个谜。

sentences.english: The way her mind worked was always a mystery to him.
sentences.chinese: 她脑子里在想些什么对他来说始终是个谜。

sentences.english: ‘Why did he do it?’ ‘I don’t know. It’s a complete mystery .’
sentences.chinese: “他为什么这么做？” “我不知道，这完全是个谜。”

sentences.english: The police never solved the mystery of Gray’s disappearance.
sentences.chinese: 警察一直没有侦破格雷失踪的谜案。

sentences.english: But why would anyone want to kill Jack? The mystery deepened .
sentences.chinese: 但为什么会有人想杀死杰克呢？疑团越来越深了。

sentences.english: What happened to the paintings after that is an unsolved mystery .
sentences.chinese: 后来那些画的命运如何是个不解之谜。

sentences.english: I don’t know how he got the job – it’s one of life’s little mysteries .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他是怎么得到那份工作的——那永远是个小小的谜。

sentences.english: How life began on Earth is one of the great mysteries of science.
sentences.chinese: 地球生命的起源是一大科学谜团。

detailed_translations.english: an event, situation etc that people do not understand or cannot explain because they do not know enough about it

name: solve
trans: vt. 解决；解答；溶解 vi. 作解答

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.chinese: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.english: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem

name: strange
trans: adj. 奇怪的；陌生的；外行的 adv. 奇怪地；陌生地，冷淡地 n. (Strange)人名；(英)斯特兰奇；(瑞典、塞)斯特朗格

sentences.english: a strange city
sentences.chinese: 陌生的城市

sentences.english: strange noises
sentences.chinese: 奇怪的噪声

sentences.english: Does Geoff’s behaviour seem strange to you?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得杰夫的行为反常吗？

sentences.english: She felt there was something strange about Dexter’s voice.
sentences.chinese: 她觉得德克斯特的声音有点奇怪。

sentences.english: Isn’t it strange how animals seem to sense danger?
sentences.chinese: 动物似乎能感觉到危险，这不是很奇怪吗？

sentences.english: It’s strange that we’ve never met before.
sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，我们以前居然从来没有碰见过。

sentences.english: For some strange reason, I slept like a baby despite the noise.
sentences.chinese: 很奇怪，不知为什么，尽管很吵闹，但我仍睡得很香。

sentences.english: Strange as it may seem, I actually prefer cold weather.
sentences.chinese: 听上去也许很奇怪，我竟然喜欢冷天。

sentences.english: That’s strange. I was sure Jude was right here a second ago.
sentences.chinese: 真奇怪，我肯定祖德刚刚还在这儿的。

sentences.english: The strange thing is all four victims had red hair.
sentences.chinese: 令人奇怪的是，四名受害者都是红头发的。

detailed_translations.english: not familiar because you have not been there before or met the person before

name: notebook
trans: n. 笔记本，笔记簿；手册

sentences.english: Copy this page in your notebook.
sentences.chinese: 把这一页抄到你的笔记本上。

sentences.english: She rummaged in the desk drawers for her notebook.
sentences.chinese: 她在书桌抽屉里翻找她的笔记本。

sentences.english: She immediately copied the letter in her notebook.
sentences.chinese: 她立即把这封信抄在她的笔记本里。

detailed_translations.english: a book made of plain paper on which you can write notes

name: problem
trans: n. 难题；引起麻烦的人 adj. 成问题的；难处理的

sentences.chinese: 她比我年长，不过那不算什么问题。

sentences.english: She gave us 20 mathematical problems to solve.
sentences.chinese: 她让我们解20道数学题。

detailed_translations.english: a situation that causes difficulties

name: scientist
trans: n. 科学家

sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.chinese: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works or is trained in science

name: scissors
trans: n. 剪刀；剪式跳法 v. 剪开；删除（scissor的第三人称单数）

sentences.english: a pair of scissors
sentences.chinese: 一把剪刀

detailed_translations.english: a tool for cutting paper, cloth etc, made of two sharp blades fastened together in the middle, with holes for your finger and thumb

detailed_translations.chinese: 剪开；删除（scissor的第三人称单数）

name: spiral
trans: n. 螺旋；旋涡；螺旋形之物 adj. 螺旋形的；盘旋的 vt. 使成螺旋形；使作螺旋形上升 vi. 盘旋；成螺旋形；螺旋形上升（过去式spiraled/spiralled，过去分词spiraled/spiralled，现在分词spiraling/spiralling，第三人称单数spirals，副词spirally）

sentences.english: ...a spiral staircase.
sentences.chinese: …一段旋梯。

sentences.english: The maze is actually two interlocking spirals.
sentences.chinese: 这个迷宫实际上是两个连锁的螺旋体。

sentences.english: The damaged plane spiralled to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 受损的飞机盘旋坠地

detailed_translations.english: moving in a continuous curve that winds around a central point
a line in the form of a curve that winds around a central point, moving further away from the centre all the time
to move in a continuous curve that gets nearer to or further from its central point as it goes round

name: chase
trans: vt. 追逐；追捕；试图赢得；雕镂 vi. 追逐；追赶；奔跑 n. 追逐；追赶；追击 n. (Chase)人名；(英)蔡斯；(法)沙斯

sentences.english: The dogs saw him running and chased him.
sentences.chinese: 那些狗看到他在跑就追他。

sentences.english: kids chasing around the house
sentences.chinese: 在屋里追逐嬉戏的孩子们

detailed_translations.chinese: 追逐， 追赶， 追求
detailed_translations.english: to quickly follow someone or something in order to catch them

name: farm
trans: n. 农场；农舍；养殖场，饲养场；生产（或加工）企业 v. 种田，务农，从事畜牧业；将......外包；把（某人）寄养在外；（暂时）转让，外租；将（税收）包出

sentences.chinese: 一座300公顷的农场

sentences.english: farm animals
sentences.chinese: 农场牲畜

sentences.english: Joe had worked on the farm all his life.
sentences.chinese: 乔在农场干了一辈子。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land used for growing crops or keeping animals

trans: vt. 取来；接来；到达；吸引 vi. 拿；取物；卖得 n. 取得；诡计

sentences.chinese: 西尔维娅从浴室拿来一条毛巾。

sentences.english: Fetch me a glass of water.

detailed_translations.english: If you fetch something or someone, you go and get them from the place where they are

sentences.english: a view of green fields and rolling hills
sentences.chinese: 田野青翠、丘陵起伏的景色

sentences.english: Fans cheered as the players took the field (= went onto the field ) .
sentences.chinese: 球员上场时球迷们欢呼起来。

detailed_translations.english: an area of land in the country, especially one where crops are grown or animals feed on grass

name: house
trans: n. 住宅；家庭；机构；议会；某种用途的建筑物 vt. 覆盖；给…房子住；把…储藏在房内 vi. 住 n. (House)人名；(英)豪斯

sentences.english: a four-bedroom house
sentences.chinese: 一幢有四间卧室的房子

sentences.english: America’s oldest publishing house
sentences.chinese: 美国历史最悠久的出版社

sentences.english: a small independent software house
sentences.chinese: 一家小型的独立软件公司

sentences.english: an auction house
sentences.chinese: 一家拍卖行

sentences.english: a famous Italian fashion house
sentences.chinese: 一家著名的意大利时装公司

detailed_translations.english: a building that someone lives in, especially one that has more than one level and is intended to be used by one family

name: street
trans: n. 街道 adj. 街道的 n. (Street)人名；(英、葡)斯特里特；(德)施特雷特

sentences.english: We moved to Center Street when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们搬到了中心大街。

sentences.english: She lives just a few streets away.
sentences.chinese: 她的住处就在几条街外。

sentences.english: I walked on further down the street .
sentences.chinese: 我继续沿着马路走。

sentences.english: Someone just moved in across the street .
sentences.chinese: 街对面有人刚刚搬进来。

sentences.chinese: 停在街对面的一辆车

detailed_translations.english: a public road in a city or town that has houses, shops etc on one or both sides

name: checkers
trans: n. 西洋棋

trans: n. 雏菊；菊科植物；极好的东西 adj. 极好的；上等的

sentences.chinese: 小雏菊快乐得就像在过一个不寻常的假日，但这天只是星期一。

sentences.english: Then it noticed the little daisy, and nodded to it, and kissed it with its beak and said: “You must also fade in here, poor little flower.
sentences.chinese: 这时他注意到了那朵小雏菊，向她点头，吻了她并说：“你在这儿一定也会枯萎，可怜的小花儿。

detailed_translations.english: a white flower with a yellow centre

trans: n. 睡梦；梦想，愿望；恍惚；极美好的人（或事物）；幻想；梦境般的事 v. 做梦，梦见；梦想；虚度光阴；想到；开小差；想象 adj. 理想的，完美的

sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.english: Her dream is to make a movie.
sentences.chinese: 她的梦想是要拍一部电影。

sentences.english: It’s quite common to dream that you’re falling.
sentences.chinese: 梦到自己坠落是常有的事。

trans: n. 电影；电影院；电影业 adj. 电影的

sentences.english: It was like one of those old John Wayne movies.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影有点像约翰•韦恩演的一部老片子。

sentences.english: We took the kids to the movies.
sentences.chinese: 我们带孩子们去看电影。

name: teeth

sentences.chinese: 高顶帽

sentences.chinese: 我们今晚有个小聚会，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

sentences.chinese: 参加社交聚会的乐趣

detailed_translations.chinese: 对不起，抱歉（表示委婉的拒绝等）

sentences.chinese: 糖对牙齿不好。

detailed_translations.english: one of the hard white objects in your mouth that you use to bite and eat food

sentences.chinese: 亨利扭动他的脚趾。

sentences.english: ...a wiggle of the hips.
sentences.chinese: …臀部的扭动。

sentences.chinese: 建筑工人们已经完成了屋顶的建造。

name: foundation
trans: n. 基础；地基；基金会；根据；创立

sentences.chinese: 建筑工人花了三星期的时间打地基。

sentences.english: The earthquake shook the foundations of the house.

sentences.chinese: 英国心脏病基金会

sentences.english: a water pipe
sentences.chinese: 水管

sentences.english: a frozen waste pipe
sentences.chinese: 冻住的污水管

sentences.english: copper pipes
sentences.chinese: 铜管

sentences.english: A pipe had burst in the kitchen and flooded the floor.
sentences.chinese: 厨房的一根管道爆裂，弄得满地都是水。

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.chinese: 他接到一封让他回家的电报。

thin metal in the form of a thread, or a piece of this
to send money electronically

sentences.english: How much do you want to bet?
sentences.chinese: 你想赌多少钱？

sentences.english: a £50 bet
sentences.chinese: 50英镑的赌注

an agreement to risk money on the result of a race, game etc or on something happening, or the money that you risk

sentences.english: The favorite, of course, is camel.
sentences.chinese: 最受欢迎的自然是驼色。

sentences.english: I wonder what the ECL on a half-camel is.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道半骆驼的有效人物等级是多少。

sentences.english: Earth tones are definitely big for this season, and camel will fit in with trends such as Queen's Country, Town meets Country and the like seamlessly.
sentences.chinese: 大地色无疑是这一季的主打，驼色也非常适合“王室风范”“大都市遭遇乡村风尚”这些流行系列，并且配合得天衣无缝。

name: hump

sentences.english: the hump of a hill
sentences.chinese: 山冈

detailed_translations.english: a large round shape that rises above the surface of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 隆起；弓起；努力；急速行进

trans: n. 猪；猪肉 vi. 生小猪；像猪一样过活 n. 警察（俚语，带有攻击性）

sentences.chinese: 他养过猪和家禽。

name: short
trans: adj. 短的；不足的；矮的，低的 n. 短；缺乏；短路；短裤 adv. 不足；突然；唐突地 n. (Short) (英) 肖特 (人名)

sentences.chinese: 一个短会

sentences.chinese: 商业英语短期课程

sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

trans: adj. 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的 adv. 夸大地 n. (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

sentences.english: a scrubbing brush
sentences.chinese: 硬毛刷，板刷

sentences.chinese: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

name: pest

exactly in a particular position or place

name: steal

sentences.chinese: 男孩们闯进一家商店，盗走了45英镑现金。

sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

sentences.english: He was threatening to burn the place down.
sentences.chinese: 他扬言要把那地方烧毁。

sentences.english: She had never been back to the place where the accident happened.
sentences.chinese: 她再也没回过事故发生的地点。

sentences.english: The theatre bar was our usual meeting place.
sentences.chinese: 这个剧院酒吧是我们见面的老地方。

sentences.english: We were living then in a place called Alberiga.
sentences.chinese: 那时候我们住在一个叫阿尔伯里格的地方。

sentences.english: The wall was quite damp in places (= in some places ) .
sentences.chinese: 墙上有几处很潮湿。

sentences.english: Did the accident happen at your place of work (= the place where you work ) ?
sentences.chinese: 事故是在你的工作地点发生的吗？

sentences.english: It took us ages to find a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 我们花了好长时间才找到一个住处。

detailed_translations.english: a space or area, for example a particular point on a surface or in a room, building, town, city etc

name: assistant
trans: n. 助手，助理，助教 adj. 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的

sentences.english: a clerical assistant
sentences.chinese: 文书助理

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

name: difficult
trans: adj. 困难的；不随和的；执拗的

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

name: information
trans: n. 信息，资料；知识；情报

sentences.english: I need more information.
sentences.chinese: 我需要更多信息。

detailed_translations.english: facts or details that tell you something about a situation, person, event etc

name: meeting
trans: n. 会议；会见；集会；汇合点 v. 会面；会合（meet的ing形式）

sentences.english: We’re having a meeting next week to discuss the matter.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周将开会讨论此事。

sentences.english: I had felt drawn to Alice ever since our first meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次见到艾丽斯就感觉被她吸引住了

detailed_translations.english: an event at which people meet to discuss and decide things

name: president
trans: n. 总统；董事长；校长；主席

sentences.english: President Bush
sentences.chinese: 布什总统

sentences.english: the president of General Motors
sentences.chinese: 通用汽车公司总裁

detailed_translations.chinese: 总统；（某组织的）最高权力人
detailed_translations.english: the official leader of a country that does not have a king or queen

name: reporter
trans: n. 记者

sentences.english: a news reporter
sentences.chinese: 新闻记者

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to write about news events for a newspaper, or to tell people about them on television or on the radio

name: guard
trans: n. 守卫；警戒；护卫队；防护装置 vi. 警惕 vt. 保卫；监视 n. (Guard)人名；(英)格尔德

sentences.english: The Sergeant told Swift to guard the entrance.
sentences.chinese: 中士叫斯威夫特守着入口。

sentences.english: a lioness guarding her cubs
sentences.chinese: 守护着幼狮的母狮

sentences.english: There were two security guards on duty outside the building.
sentences.chinese: 大楼外面有两名保安在值勤。

detailed_translations.english: to protect a person, place, or object by staying near them and watching them
someone whose job is to protect a place or person

name: surprise
trans: n. 惊奇，诧异；突然袭击 vt. 使惊奇；奇袭 adj. 令人惊讶的

sentences.english: His strange question surprised her.
sentences.chinese: 他那奇怪的问题令她感到意外。

sentences.english: I didn’t know you two knew each other. Mind you, it doesn’t surprise me .
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你们俩认识。 尽管如此，我并不感到意外。

sentences.english: What surprised me most was that she didn’t seem to care.
sentences.chinese: 最令我感到意外的是，她好像毫不在乎。

sentences.english: The man had a look of surprise on his face.
sentences.chinese: 那人脸上一副惊讶的表情。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使诧异,使惊异,使感到意外
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel surprised
the feeling you have when something unexpected or unusual happens

name: tasty
trans: adj. 美味的；高雅的；有趣的 n. 可口的东西；引人入胜的东西

sentences.english: a simple but tasty meal
sentences.chinese: 简单而可口的饭菜

detailed_translations.english: food that is tasty has a good taste, but is not sweet

detailed_translations.chinese: 可口的东西；引人入胜的东西

name: brake
trans: n. 刹车；阻碍（物）；敞篷四轮马车；纤维捣碎机；灌木丛；欧洲蕨 v. 刹车；阻碍

sentences.english: Test your brakes after driving through water.
sentences.chinese: 车子涉水之后要检验一下刹车。

sentences.english: I managed to put the brakes on just in time.
sentences.chinese: 我最终及时刹了车。

sentences.english: Moira slammed on the brakes (=  used them suddenly and with a lot of force  ) .
sentences.chinese: 莫伊拉猛踩刹车。

sentences.english: the screech of brakes
sentences.chinese: 刹车的刺耳噪音

sentences.english: He braked sharply to avoid the dog.
sentences.chinese: 他突然急刹车，想避开那条狗。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a vehicle go more slowly or stop
to make a vehicle or bicycle go more slowly or stop by using its brake

name: helmet
trans: n. 钢盔，头盔 n. (Helmet)人名；(德)黑尔梅特

sentences.english: The Sword split the Knight's helmet and bit him fatally.
sentences.chinese: 剑劈开了骑士的头盔并致命地刺进他。

sentences.english: Instead, he was told the last time that she loved him, got a hug from her, put his helmet on her so that she can live, and die himself...
sentences.chinese: 相反，他叫女孩最后一次说她爱他，最后一次拥抱他，并让她戴上自己的头盔，因而，女孩可以幸免于难，而他自己却离开了人世……

sentences.english: Without Christ we are defenseless against the Devil, but with "the helmet of salvation" our minds are protected by God.
sentences.chinese: 没有基督，我们无力防御魔鬼的攻击；但有救恩的头盔，我们的心思便有神的保护。

detailed_translations.english: a strong hard hat that soldiers,  motorcycle  riders, the police etc wear to protect their heads

name: oil
trans: n. 油；石油；油画颜料 vt. 加油；涂油；使融化 vi. 融化；加燃油

sentences.english: a rise in the price of oil
sentences.chinese: 石油价格的上涨

sentences.english: the importance of protecting our oil supplies
sentences.chinese: 保护我们石油供应的重要性

sentences.english: an oil refinery
sentences.chinese: 炼油厂

sentences.english: The bicycle chain needs oiling.
sentences.chinese: 自行车链条需要上油了。

detailed_translations.english: the thick dark liquid from under the ground from which petrol is produced
to put oil onto part of a machine or part of something that moves, to help it to move or work more smoothly

name: patch
trans: n. 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地 vt. 修补；解决；掩饰 vi. 打补丁 n. (Patch)人名；(英)帕奇

sentences.english: Look out for icy patches on the road.
sentences.chinese: 小心路上结冰的地方。

sentences.english: a cat with a white patch on its chest
sentences.chinese: 胸部有一块白斑的猫

sentences.english: He combs his hair over his bald patch .
sentences.chinese: 他把头发梳过来盖住秃掉的地方。

detailed_translations.chinese: 眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地
detailed_translations.english: a small area of something that is different from the area around it
to repair a hole in something by putting a piece of something else over it

name: pump
trans: n. 泵；泵送；无带浅帮女鞋；平底轻便鞋 v. 抽吸；喷出；注入；射向目标；打气；（非正式）盘问；剧烈上下晃动；让……使用大量药物；洗胃；增加数值 n. (Pump) （美、俄、印、泰、加）蓬普（人名）

sentences.english: water/air/beer etc pump (=for moving water, air etc)
sentences.chinese: 抽水机/抽气机/啤酒泵等

sentences.english: It's not enough to get rid of raw sewage by pumping it out to sea.
sentences.chinese: 仅用水泵将未经处理的污水排入海中是不够的。

sentences.english: The money raised will be used to dig bore holes to pump water into the dried-up lake.
sentences.chinese: 筹到的钱款将用来挖井眼，再将水抽入干涸的湖中。

detailed_translations.english: a machine for forcing liquid or gas into or out of something
to make liquid or gas move in a particular direction, using a pump

name: climb
trans: v. 爬；攀登；上升；（植物沿墙或架子）攀缘生长；晋升；（道路）倾斜向上；爬升；费力爬进（或爬出） n. 爬；攀登；增值；（职位或社会地位的）提高；（名次的）攀升；（登山或攀缘运动中要爬的）山；山道；（飞机的）爬升

sentences.english: Harry climbed the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在河边爬树。

detailed_translations.english: to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do
to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do

name: cling
trans: vi. 坚持，墨守；紧贴；附着

sentences.english: His wet shirt clung to his body.
sentences.chinese: 他的湿衬衫紧紧地贴在身上。

sentences.english: After her mother's death, Sara clung to her aunt more than ever.
sentences.chinese: 萨拉在母亲去世后比以往任何时候都更依附于她的姨妈。

sentences.english: Throughout the trial she had clung to the belief that he was innocent.
sentences.chinese: 在整个审判中，她都坚持相信他是清白的。

detailed_translations.english: to stick to someone or something, or seem to surround them

name: hatch
trans: n. 孵化；舱口 vt. 孵；策划 vi. 孵化 n. (Hatch)人名；(西)阿奇；(英)哈奇

sentences.english: The problems do not end if crocodiles successfully hatch from the eggs.
sentences.chinese: 即使鳄鱼成功地从卵中孵化出来，这些问题也不会终止。

detailed_translations.english: a hole in a ship or aircraft, usually used for loading goods, or the door that covers it
if an egg hatches, or if it is hatched, it breaks, letting the young bird, insect etc come out

name: shelter
trans: n. 庇护；避难所；遮盖物 vt. 保护；使掩蔽 vi. 躲避，避难 n. (Shelter)人名；(英)谢尔特

sentences.english: The men took shelter in a bombed-out farmhouse.
sentences.chinese: 那些男人躲在一间被炸毁的农舍里。

sentences.english: All around me, people were running for shelter .
sentences.chinese: 我周围的人都在奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: ...a wooden house, sheltered by a low pointed roof.
sentences.chinese: …一座由低矮的尖屋顶遮蔽的木房子。

detailed_translations.english: protection from danger or from wind, rain, hot sun etc
If a place or thing is sheltered by something, it is protected by that thing from wind and rain

name: travel
trans: v. 长途旅行；经过（某地区）；（非正式）经受得住旅行；（物体，放射线）移动；行进，传送；经得住长途运输；广为流传；受喜爱；（带球）走步；（非正式）车辆快速移动 n. 旅行；（设备）旅行用的；（机器部件的）运动范围（或速度、模式）

sentences.english: Light travels faster than sound.
sentences.chinese: 光比声音传播得快。

detailed_translations.chinese: 旅行； 行进； 被传送， 被传播； 走过， 驶过
detailed_translations.english: to move at a particular speed or in a particular direction
the activity of travelling

name: counter
trans: n. 柜台；对立面；计数器；（某些棋盘游戏的）筹码 vt. 反击，还击；反向移动，对着干；反驳，回答 vi. 逆向移动，对着干；反驳 adj. 相反的 adv. 反方向地；背道而驰地

sentences.english: He wondered if the girl behind the counter recognised him.
sentences.chinese: 他在想柜台后面的那个女孩是否认出了他。

sentences.english: Set the video counter to zero before you press play.
sentences.chinese: 在按播放键之前，把录像机上的计数器调到零。

detailed_translations.english: the place where you pay or are served in a shop, bank, restaurant etc

name: granite
trans: n. 花岗岩；坚毅；冷酷无情

sentences.english: He was very skilled at pointing down the blocks of granite.
sentences.chinese: 他善于把花岗岩石凿平。

sentences.english: If you're working in steel or granite, redesigning or adding onto something is very expensive.
sentences.chinese: 如果你用钢或花岗岩来工作，重新设计或增加一些东西是很贵的。

sentences.english: Everything you see, from the cobblestones the characters walk on to the granite within the buildings, all those details help to bring you into that era.
sentences.chinese: 影片里你所见之处，从角色走过的鹅卵石路到大楼的花岗石，所有的细节都能帮助将你置身于那个年代。” 克罗尔解释道。

detailed_translations.english: a very hard grey rock, often used in building

name: hunt
trans: v. 打猎；搜索；追捕；（英国）猎狐运动；用（马和猎犬）狩猎（尤指猎狐或鹿）；用猎犬（或骑马）打猎；（动物）追捕猎物）；（机器、仪表针或系统）摆动；（飞机或火箭）不规则摆动 n. 搜寻；打猎；（英国）猎狐活动；（英国经常举行猎狐运动的）猎狐队伍；狩猎团；狩猎场；追捕 n. (Hunt) （美）安（人名）

sentences.english: lion/rhino/stag etc hunt
sentences.chinese: 猎狮/犀牛/雄鹿等

sentences.english: the hunt for the missing child
sentences.chinese: 搜寻失踪儿童

sentences.english: Wolves tend to hunt in packs (= hunt in groups ) .
sentences.chinese: 狼往往成群捕猎。

detailed_translations.english: an occasion when people chase animals in order to kill or catch them
to chase animals and birds in order to kill or catch them

name: limestone
trans: n. [岩] 石灰岩

sentences.english: ...high limestone cliffs.
sentences.chinese: …高耸的石灰岩峭壁。

detailed_translations.english: a type of rock that contains calcium

name: obsidian
trans: n. 黑曜石

sentences.english: The Texas show includes an obsidian mask that likely traveled to Khara Khorum all the way from Egypt, Lessem says.
sentences.chinese: 德克萨斯州展出包括了一个黑曜石面具，可能是从埃及被带到哈喇和林来的，莱塞姆说。

detailed_translations.english: a type of rock that looks like black glass

name: slate
trans: n. 板岩，石板；（盖房顶的）石板瓦；（旧时学生用以写字的）石板；（尤指对食物和饮料）赊账，挂账；笔记型电脑；候选人名单，提名名单；一系列资助；（置于摄影机前的）（识别一次电影拍摄镜头细节起讫的）开拍板 v. （尤指在报纸上）批评，抨击；预定，计划，安排；推举，选定；用石板铺盖（某物，尤指屋顶）；用镜头起讫板识别（镜头） adj. 石板色的，深蓝灰色的 【名】 （Slate）（英）斯莱特（人名）

sentences.english: There were several slates missing from the roof.
sentences.chinese: 房顶有几块石板瓦掉了。

detailed_translations.english: a dark grey rock that can easily be split into flat thin pieces

detailed_translations.chinese: 铺石板；严厉批评某人；计划
detailed_translations.english: if something is slated to happen, it is planned to happen in the future, especially at a particular time

name: burp
trans: n. 打嗝；饱嗝儿 vi. 打嗝；打饱嗝 vt. 使打嗝

name: learn
trans: vt. 学习；得知；认识到 vi. 学习；获悉

sentences.english: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.chinese: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.english: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.english: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.chinese: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to gain knowledge of a subject or skill, by experience, by studying it, or by being taught

name: manners
trans: n. 礼貌（manner的复数形式） n. (Manners)人名；(英、瑞典)曼纳斯

sentences.english: You should be ashamed of your bad manners.
sentences.chinese: 你应该对自己的不礼貌感到羞耻。

name: robot
trans: n. 机器人；遥控设备，自动机械；机械般工作的人

sentences.english: cars built by robots
sentences.chinese: 机器人制造的汽车

detailed_translations.english: a machine that can move and do some of the work of a person, and is usually controlled by a computer

name: rude
trans: adj. 粗鲁的；无礼的；狂暴的；未开化的 n. (Rude)人名；(英、西、瑞典)鲁德；(法)吕德

sentences.english: a rude remark
sentences.chinese: 粗鲁的话

sentences.english: I didn’t mean to be rude, but I had to leave early.
sentences.chinese: 我并不想显得无礼，但我不得不早走。

detailed_translations.english: speaking or behaving in a way that is not polite and is likely to offend or annoy people

name: turn
trans: vt. 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换 vi. 转向；转变；转动 n. 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止 n. (Turn)人名；(德、匈)图恩

sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

name: helicopter
trans: n. [航] 直升飞机 vi. [航] 乘直升飞机 vt. 由直升机运送

sentences.english: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.chinese: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.english: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.chinese: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.english: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

detailed_translations.english: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly

name: leak
trans: v. 使渗漏，泄露；漏，渗；泄漏出去；透露 n. 泄漏；漏洞，裂缝；泄漏出的液体（或气体）；（秘密信息的）透露；撒尿；漏电 n. (Leak) （美、印尼、新等）利克（人名）

sentences.english: The roof is leaking.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶在漏水。

sentences.english: A tanker is leaking oil off the coast of Scotland.
sentences.chinese: 苏格兰海岸附近有一艘油轮漏油。

sentences.english: 英语例句：The boat had sprung a leak (= a hole had appeared in it ).
sentences.chinese: 小船出现了漏洞。

detailed_translations.english: if a container, pipe, roof etc leaks, or if it leaks gas, liquid etc, there is a small hole or crack in it that lets gas or liquid flow through

sentences.chinese: 杰里，这是我的朋友休。

detailed_translations.english: to try to remove something from a river, ocean etc by pulling a rope, line etc through the water

name: brickmaker
trans: n. 制砖工人

name: daughter
trans: n. 女儿；[遗][农学] 子代 adj. 女儿的；子代的

sentences.english: She’s got two daughters and one son.
sentences.chinese: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子。

sentences.english: our eldest daughter
sentences.chinese: 我们的长女

detailed_translations.english: someone’s female child

name: dry
trans: adj. 干的；口渴的；枯燥无味的；禁酒的 vt. 把…弄干 vi. 变干 n. 干涸 n. (Dry)人名；(法)德里

sentences.english: I need to change into some dry clothes .
sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.english: Make sure that the surface is clean and dry before you start to paint.
sentences.chinese: 油漆之前一定先要确保表面清洁干燥。

sentences.english: You should store disks in a cool, dry place.
sentences.chinese: 你应该把磁盘存放在阴凉干燥的地方。

sentences.english: The path is dry as a bone (= very dry ) .
sentences.chinese: 这条小道很干燥。

detailed_translations.english: without water or liquid inside or on the surface

name: gardener
trans: n. 园丁；花匠；园艺家 n. (Gardener)人名；(英)加德纳

sentences.english: She employed a gardener.
sentences.chinese: 她雇了一个园丁。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to work in gardens

name: lesson
trans: n. 教训；课 vt. 教训；上课

sentences.english: piano lessons
sentences.chinese: 钢琴课

detailed_translations.english: a period of time in which someone is taught a particular skill, for example how to play a musical instrument or drive a car

name: wish
trans: v. 希望，但愿；盼望，想要；祝，祝愿；祈愿，许愿；（印度英语）问候；要求（某人）做某事 n. 希望，愿望；祈求，心愿；祝愿，祝福；想要的东西，希望的事；请求，要求 n. (Wish) （美）威什（人名）

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.
sentences.chinese: 闭上眼睛许个愿。

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

name: birthday
trans: n. 生日，诞辰；诞生的日子

sentences.english: It’s my birthday on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 星期一是我的生日。

sentences.english: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.english: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

detailed_translations.english: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born

name: broken
trans: adj. 破碎的；坏掉的 v. 折断；打碎；损坏（break的过去分词）

sentences.english: Mind the broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 当心碎玻璃。

sentences.english: a badly broken leg
sentences.chinese: 严重骨折的腿

sentences.english: Gibbs had an X-ray, which revealed no broken bones.
sentences.chinese: 吉布斯拍了X光片，显示没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: in small pieces because it has been hit, dropped etc

name: platypus
trans: n. [脊椎] 鸭嘴兽

sentences.english: The female platypus lays eggs like a bird.
sentences.chinese: 像雌鸟一样，雌鸭嘴兽也下蛋。

sentences.english: Even so, the platypus genome reveals the animal held onto genes for odor-detection.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，鸭嘴兽的基因组还显示其带有气味感觉的基因。

detailed_translations.english: a small furry Australian animal that has a beak and feet like a duck, lays eggs, and produces milk for its young

name: sleek
trans: adj. 圆滑的；井然有序的 vt. 使…光滑；掩盖 vi. 打扮整洁；滑动

sentences.english: the sleek lines of the new Mercedes
sentences.chinese: 这款新梅赛德斯汽车的优美外形

detailed_translations.english: sleek hair or fur is straight, shiny, and healthy-looking
to make hair or fur smooth and shiny by putting water or oil on it

name: webbed
trans: adj. 有蹼的；蜘蛛网状的 v. 用蹼将…连接；结网；使落入圈套（web的过去分词）

name: butterfly
trans: n. 蝴蝶；蝶泳；举止轻浮的人；追求享乐的人

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

detailed_translations.english: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours

name: frog
trans: n. 青蛙；[铁路] 辙叉；饰扣 vi. 捕蛙 n. (Frog)人名；(俄)弗罗格

sentences.english: The tadpole has become a frog.
sentences.chinese: 这个蝌蚪已长成青蛙。

sentences.english: A tadpole metamorphoses into a frog.
sentences.chinese: 蝌蚪会变成青蛙。

sentences.english: The frog darted out its tongue to catch a mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 这只青蛙突然伸出舌头捕捉蚊子。

detailed_translations.chinese: 青蛙；[铁路] 辙叉；饰扣
detailed_translations.english: a small green animal that lives near water and has long legs for jumping

name: penguin
trans: n. 企鹅；空军地勤人员

sentences.english: He asked some birds if they knew where the penguin came from. But they ignored him.
sentences.chinese: 他去问小鸟们，知不知道小企鹅是从哪里来的啊，可是她们却睬都不睬他。

sentences.english: Perhaps we cannot relate to the severe conditions enduring by the Emperor penguin, but each of us knows what it means to sit on our own versions of ice and egg.
sentences.chinese: 可能我们无法理解国王企鹅所忍受的严酷环境与我们有何关联，但我们每一个人都知道在冰上孵育自己的蛋代表什么意思。

detailed_translations.english: a large black and white Antarctic sea bird, which cannot fly but uses its wings for swimming

name: robin
trans: n. 知更鸟 鸫

sentences.english: The robin carols from the treetops its loud, hearty strain.
sentences.chinese: 知更鸟在树顶上尽情地大声歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a small European bird with a red breast and brown back

name: shark
trans: n. 鲨鱼；骗子 vi. 诈骗 vt. 敲诈

sentences.english: Sharks were circling around our boat.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans

name: change
trans: v. 改变，转变，（使）不同；（使）变换；替代，更换；交换；货币兑换；将……换成零钱；退还 n. 变化，改变；替代物；换洗衣物；零钱，硬币；换乘；全新体验；新月相的出现

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

name: color
trans: n. 颜色；肤色；颜料；脸色 vt. 粉饰；给...涂颜色；歪曲 vi. 变色；获得颜色

sentences.english: What color dress did you buy?
sentences.chinese: 你买的连衣裙是什么颜色的？

sentences.english: jams that contain no artificial colors or preservatives
sentences.chinese: 不含人工色素和防腐剂的果酱

detailed_translations.english: red, blue, yellow, green, brown, purple etc

name: fall
trans: v. 落下；跌倒；下垂；跪下；（地面）向下倾斜；（数量等的）减少；  （雨或雪） 降落；沦陷； 阵亡；进入（某状态）；突然来到 n. 落下；跌倒；（雪、岩石等的）降落；（数量等的）减少；秋季；垮台、衰败 adj. 秋天的 n. (Fall) （西）法勒（人名）

sentences.english: The tree was about to fall.
sentences.chinese: 那棵树快要倒下了。

sentences.english: The book fell from his hands.
sentences.chinese: 书从他手上跌落。

sentences.english: Enough rain had fallen to flood the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 雨量很大，淹没了地面。

sentences.english: She flushed and her eyes fell (= she looked down ) .
sentences.chinese: 她脸一红，垂下了眼帘。

detailed_translations.english: to move or drop down from a higher position to a lower position

name: food
trans: n. 食物；养料

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.english: I love Italian food, especially pasta.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.english: He was told to cut down on salty and fatty foods.
sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

name: tree
trans: n. 树；木料；树状物 vt. 把...赶上树 vi. 爬上树；逃上树 n. (Tree)人名；(英)特里

sentences.english: As a kid, I loved to climb trees.
sentences.chinese: 小时候，我喜欢爬树。

sentences.english: the trunk of an old oak tree (= the main central part, from which the branches grow )
sentences.chinese: 一棵老橡树的树干

detailed_translations.english: a very tall plant that has branches and leaves, and lives for many years

name: cocoon
trans: n. 茧；卵囊 vt. 把……紧紧包住

sentences.english: ...like a butterfly emerging from a cocoon.
sentences.chinese: …好似蝴蝶破茧而出。

detailed_translations.english: a silk cover that young  moths  and other insects make to protect themselves while they are growing

name: mate
trans: n. 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物 vt. 使配对；使一致；结伴 vi. 交配；成配偶；紧密配合 n. (Mate)人名；(日)蛏(姓)；(西、意、塞)马特；(波黑)马特；(罗、俄)马泰

sentences.english: He has found his ideal mate.
sentences.chinese: 他已经找到了理想的配偶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 助手，大副；配偶；同事；配对物
detailed_translations.english: someone you work with, do an activity with, or share something with
if animals mate, they have sex to produce babies

name: slimy
trans: adj. 黏滑的；泥泞的；谄媚的，虚伪的

sentences.english: a slimy politician
sentences.chinese: 假惺惺的政客

detailed_translations.chinese: 黏滑的；泥泞的；谄媚的，虚伪的
detailed_translations.english: friendly in an unpleasant way that does not seem sincere – used to show disapproval

name: tunnel
trans: n. 隧道；坑道；洞穴通道 vt. 挖；在…打开通道；在…挖掘隧道 vi. 挖掘隧道；打开通道

sentences.english: a railway tunnel
sentences.chinese: 铁路隧道

sentences.english: the Channel Tunnel (= between England and France )
sentences.chinese: 〔英吉利〕海峡隧道

detailed_translations.english: a passage that has been dug under the ground for cars, trains etc to go through

detailed_translations.chinese: 挖；在…打开通道；在…挖掘隧道
detailed_translations.english: to dig a long passage under the ground

name: barf
trans: v. 呕吐 n. 一阵呕吐；呕吐物

name: nasty
trans: adj. 极差的；恶心的；恶意的；有害的；严重的（伤、疾病）；粗鲁的，下流的；可恶的；难对付的 n. 令人不快的人（或物）；可恶；恐怖录像或影片 n. (Nasty) （俄、美、印）耐史迪（人名）

sentences.english: a nasty temper
sentences.chinese: 坏脾气

sentences.english: the nasty things that were being written about her
sentences.chinese: 人们描述的那些关于她的坏事情

sentences.english: There’s a nasty streak in her character.
sentences.chinese: 她性格中有令人讨厌的一面。

sentences.english: Drivers often have a nasty habit of driving too close to cyclists.
sentences.chinese: 司机常有一个坏习惯，就是车开得离骑自行车的人太近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 下流的；肮脏的；脾气不好的；险恶的
detailed_translations.english: nasty behaviour or remarks are extremely unkind and unpleasant

name: shower
trans: n. 淋浴；（倾泻般出现的）一阵，一大批；阵雨 vt. 大量地给予；把……弄湿 vi. 淋浴；下阵雨

sentences.english: Why does the phone always ring when I’m in the shower?
sentences.chinese: 为什么电话铃总是在我洗澡的时候响？

sentences.english: I’d like to use the shower if that’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我想用一下这里的淋浴。

sentences.english: The bathroom has a separate shower cubicle (= a shower in a separate part of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫生间里有一个独立的淋浴间。

sentences.english: I need a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我需要洗个淋浴。

sentences.english: Mike shaved and showered.
sentences.chinese: 迈克刮了脸，冲了个淋浴。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you stand under to wash your whole body
to wash your whole body while standing under a shower

name: trash
trans: n. 垃圾；废物 vt. 丢弃；修剪树枝

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc

name: break
trans: v. 打破；（人或动物）骨折；擦破（皮肤）；违犯；弄坏；（机器）失灵；打断（连续性）；（天气）突变；（新闻）突然传开；终止 n. 间断；休息；短假；缺口；破裂；进攻；骨折；结束；机会；（斯诺克）一次连续得分；蓓蕾

sentences.english: I had to break a window to get into the house.
sentences.chinese: 我只得打破一扇窗户进屋。

detailed_translations.english: if you break something, you make it separate into two or more pieces, for example by hitting it, dropping it, or bending it

name: half
trans: n. 一半；半场；半学年 adv. 一半地；部分地 adj. 一半的；不完全的；半途的 n. (Half)人名；(阿拉伯)哈勒夫；(德)哈尔夫；(英)哈夫

sentences.english: Two halves make a whole.
sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

name: may
trans: aux. 可以，能够；可能，也许；祝，愿；会，能

sentences.english: I may be late, so don’t wait for me.
sentences.chinese: 我可能会迟到，所以别等我。

sentences.english: Some chemicals may cause environmental damage.
sentences.chinese: 有些化学物品可能会给环境造成破坏。

sentences.english: There may not be enough money to pay for the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 可能钱不够支付修理费。

sentences.english: Well, I may have been wrong.
sentences.chinese: 好了，可能是我错了。

sentences.english: They may have called while you were out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时他们可能给你打过电话。

sentences.english: It may be that Minoan ships were built and repaired here.
sentences.chinese: 米诺斯人的船可能就是在这里建造和修理的。

sentences.english: Your job may well involve some travelling (= it is fairly likely ) .
sentences.chinese: 你的工作很可能有时需要出差。

sentences.english: The problem may be solved in a number of different ways.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题可以用几种不同的方式解决。

sentences.english: We pray for those who died – may they rest in peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们为逝者祈祷——愿他们安息。

detailed_translations.english: if something may happen or may be true, there is a possibility that it will happen or be true but this is not certain

name: offer
trans: vt. 提供；出价；试图 n. 提议；出价；意图；录取通知书 vi. 提议；出现；献祭；求婚

sentences.english: Can I offer you something to drink?
sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.english: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.chinese: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone if they would like to have something, or to hold something out to them so that they can take it
a statement saying that you are willing to do something for someone or give them something
